message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $10000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. Considering the product's value to me is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $11500. This is a reasonable compromise, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Given the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $11000.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll offer you the product for $11750. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a good deal for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $11500 for the product.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11500. I'll make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll offer you the product for $12250. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.

I'm not willing to sell the product for $12000, Bob. I've already made several concessions, and I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll make one more offer, and then I'll have to reconsider selling the product to someone else. I'll offer you the product for $12500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Thank you for your offers, Alice. After considering all the options, I am willing to pay $12250 for the product.
